sourcesContent:
<template>
<n-form @submit.prevent="createPersona">

    <n-form-item label="gender">
        <n-h5>重要性别</n-h5>
        <n-checkbox v-model:checked="personaInfo.gender">
           男性
        </n-checkbox>
        <n-checkbox v-model:checked="personaInfo.gender" :disabled="disabled">
           女性
        </n-checkbox>
    </n-form-item>
    
    <n-form-item label="gender">
        <n-h5>年收入范围</n-h5>
        <n-input pair
          separator="-"
          :placeholder="placeholder"
          clearable
          @blur="handleInputBlur"
          @focus="handleInputFocus"
          @change="handleInputChange"
          @update:value="handleInputInput">
        </n-input>
    </n-form-item>

         <n-form-item v-model:value='personaInfo.values' label="values">
         <n-h5>价值观理念</n-h5>
         <n-input type="textarea"/>
         </n-form-item>

         <n-form-item v-model:value="personaInfo.needs" label="needs">
         <n-h5>与产品相关的诉求</n-h5>
         <n-input type="textarea"></n-input>
         </n-form-item>
         
         <n-form-item v-model:value="personaInfo.others" label="others">
             <n-h5>其它补充</n-h5>
             <n-input type="textarea"/>
         </n-form-item>
        <n-button type="primary" @click="ceatePersona">提交</n-button>
    </n-form>
</template>

<script setup>
import {ref} from 'vue';
import {  NButton, NForm, NInput, NH5, NCheckbox} from 'naive-ui';
const personaInfo = ref({
    gender: '',
    values: '',
    needs : '',
    others : '',
    })
const createPersona = () =>{
      console.log('persona');
      console.log(personaInfo.value);
      try{
          
          const resp =  await axios.get('http://localhost:8005/account/auth/',{
            headers: {
                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` // 设置请求头
                }});
          }catch (error) {
        console.error('Failed to fetch user info:', error);
        }
      }

</script>
<script>
  export default{
      name:'CreatePersonaForm'
      };
</script>
